channel.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
channel.description:
Interesting read from how RSC started and progressed:
http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/DevBlog:The_First_Four_Years

item.description:

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @mona_lisa mona lisa
item.description:
@mona_lisa wrote:

[quote=“Jusba, post:8, topic:444364”]I meant the years 2001-2004 with that early 2000 :p.
And everybody knows rsc came out to public in january 2001.
The people who claim to have played in 1999 are probably trolling or they actually have played DeviousMud. So many people claim that tho so most of them are trolling or feel the need to act like the boss of rsc.

I wouldn’t call playing DeviousMud as playing rsc anyways. Its like saying diablo and wow are the same game.[/quote]
rsc was released in 2005 to be correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:21, topic:444364”]You’d then have people getting sick of bots though, driving legit players out (which is what RSCE is seeing).

That’s why we think we’re taking the best route with RSCD.[/quote]

lol

Read full topic

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

AlCoHoLiC:

if rsc was f2p on front page of runescape.com i think 1000s of people would play

Even more if Jagex allowed the creation of new accounts with a fresh start for everyone on both a F2P and P2P world… It would honestly be far more than the low thousands IMO.

You’d then have people getting sick of bots though, driving legit players out (which is what RSCE is seeing).

That’s why we think we’re taking the best route with RSCD.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:16, topic:444364”][quote author=AlCoHoLiC link=topic=547054.msg4010899#msg4010899 date=1339195995]

(creds to xent for originally posting)

i wonder if anyone actually said to andrew or paul do you wankers realize 1000s of people would still play rsc…
[/quote]

100s* if that. RSC is not an appealing game anymore…[/quote]I’d pay for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @Jusba Jusba
item.description:
@Jusba wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:16, topic:444364”][quote author=AlCoHoLiC link=topic=547054.msg4010899#msg4010899 date=1339195995]

(creds to xent for originally posting)

i wonder if anyone actually said to andrew or paul do you wankers realize 1000s of people would still play rsc…
[/quote]

100s* if that. RSC is not an appealing game anymore…[/quote]
After 11 years it still is for me. Altho I don’t play atm I know that I will start again eventually :p.
And rsc can be updated to make it appealing to even more people.
I’d like to see some sort of diablo style raiding. Aoe spells outside wild could also grant you att,def or str xp instead of magic.
I wouldn’t mind some changes to pking too. As long as catching stays the same.
Unique items! For example an item that grants you 20% chance to block spells etc. I could come up with hundreds of abilities that wouldn’t change pking too much.
And durability could also be stolen from diablo :p. So that the items always break eventually to keep the economy balanced. So the only use for those items would be selling and pking.

Read full topic

And everybody knows rsc came out to public in january 2001.
The people who claim to have played in 1999 are probably trolling or they actually have played DeviousMud. So many people claim that tho so most of them are trolling or feel the need to act like the boss of rsc.

[/quote]

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Yeah I knew the 1999 claim was bogus, but I wasn’t too sure about the late 2000 claim. I remember some guy on a server who was like
17 last year kept claiming he played back in 1999, how ridiculous. It’d be cool to be able to find that pcgamer article.

edit: I’m surprised how it took rs only 4 months to get 1000 players at one time.

Read full topic

item.title: Blog post by Paul Gower
item.dc:creator: @AlCoHoLiC AlCoHoLiC
item.description:
@AlCoHoLiC wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:5, topic:444364”]well finally this blog answers the when rsc was started question. As much of a troll question it was, it was a legit
question between 2000 and 2001.[/quote]

it is quite amusing when people say they were playing in 1999, most of them would of been around 6 years old then and the game wasnt even out… i only remember rs came out in 2001 because i remember pcgamer magazine did an article on it in 2001 and i was in 3rd year of school.

Read full topic

Then lets get rid of this troll infected bunch of fuckers and play like it was early 2000 all over again!
And fuck you all xp whiners :D. Just enjoy your mithril 2 handed newbies!

edit: Btw rscd should have story teller npc’s that tell random stories about rsc and the legends of it ^^[/quote]

cough 2001 cough
